modName: Kurisu Lover Stone Skill Experience Boost
summary:
A set of .esp that increases the buff on The Lover Stone for increase skill experience. - 30%, 50%, 70%, 100%.
Skill Experience Multiplier!
descriptionHtml:
( ￣┏＿┓￣)

What is this mod?
This mod is a set of .esp's that increases the multiplication value of The Lover Stone Buff.
Basically, this mod lets you level up your skills faster, example (Smithing, Archery...-).

Default increase in skill percentage of Lover Stone is, 15% (1.15x).

This mod have multiple .esp's that gives:
- 30% (1.30x increase in skill level up)
- 50% (1.50x increase in skill level up)
- 70% (1.70x increase in skill level up)
- 100% (2x increase in skill level up)

How to use:
- Download the file
- Locate your Data folder on Skyrim
- Put your desired .esp inside the Data folder
- Activate it
- Locate the Lover Stone, search on google for map, or check the map I've included
- Get the Lover Stone Blessing
- Go and play

What's inside the file when I download it?
- A set of esp's
- A Readme (How to)
- A Map containing the location of Lover Stone

(￣┏Д┓￣ )

[b] Bold [/b]pop
[b] Bold [/b]
